blocks.hint_text: Please enter JSON string for properties. Eg., [{"key":"sample_key","value":"sample_value"}]

elements.text: *NOTE*: Properties are automatically migrated when selected project is consumed by any pipeline provided the pipeline configuration has "Migrate Properties" checked.
